Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A loosely cross-linked synthetic polycarboxylic-type hydrophilic polymer resin, laxative and anti-diarrheal Calcium Polycarbophil increases stool frequency, fecal water content, and fecal weight in a dose-dependent manner. It is used for idiopathic constipation, secretory diarrhea, and irritable bowel syndrome. (NCI04)
